subject: android/audio_utils: Fix null pointer dereference
commitMessage:
android/audio_utils: Fix null pointer dereference

Add check for NULL before assigning
a value to a pointer.

Change-Id: I1d7eb53f025b299f7e2b31a4c08dffc2477b856f

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

Can you send the patch to upstream firstly?

Tizen Bluez should match with upstream bluez.
Tizen Bluez should possible the same with upstream bluez.

At the same time, the patch should not urgent for Tizen.

Therefore, please send it to linux-bluetooth@vger.kernel.org firstly.

Patch Set 1:

This one I submitted to upstream. Since this file (android/audio_utils/resampler.c) is copied from android, they are not accepting patch on that file. What to do?

Patch Set 1:

Android is upstream too.

You can send the patch to android upstream.

How to send the patch to android upstream?
It is almost the same with bluez upstream.

Patch Set 1:

Thanks. I will send that to Android upstream then.

subject: android/socket: Add PBAP supported features bits
commitMessage:
android/socket: Add PBAP supported features bits

Add PBAP supported features in sdp record.
After this the remote client-PCE is able to browse the
PSE supported features.

Change-Id: Iec4e9a8fc57d01d6269ab20d035bbac072e57755

comments.message:

Can you send the patch to upstream firstly?

Tizen Bluez should match with upstream bluez.
Tizen Bluez should possible the same with upstream bluez.

At the same time, the patch should not urgent for Tizen.

Therefore, please send it to linux-bluetooth@vger.kernel.org firstly.

Patch Set 1:

I have submitted this to upstream. Thanks.

subject: android/socket: Add MAP supported features bits
commitMessage:
android/socket: Add MAP supported features bits

Add MAP supported features in sdp record.
After this the remote client-MNS is able to browse the
MAS supported features.

Change-Id: I3a709eb9841ef20c782bcec378f67076aee22db6

subject: clean up org.bluez dbus policy file and add rules for 'bluetooth' user
commitMessage:
clean up org.bluez dbus policy file and add rules for 'bluetooth' user

Change-Id: I476cfc0c2641b98030c8be30a67e0dcad2763fc2
Signed-off-by: Corentin Lecouvey <corentin.lecouvey@open.eurogiciel.org>

comments.message:
Patch Set 3: Verified+1

without trailing whitespaces

Patch Set 3: Code-Review+1

the modification is right for NTB, but I hope you know you are modifying the upstream BlueZ dbus conf file that will affect old Tizen Bluetooth Framework.

If you sure Tizen-3.0 common will not use old Tizen Bluetooth Framework, you can do that. :)
